cause.description:
vote for Petra, as it is a great symbol of Engineering & Protection.
http://www.new7wonders.com/index.php?id=351
1. PETRA is a very old example of a modern city, it is in deed a wonder
2. Petra is more than dream, it deserves to be one of the New7Wonders
cause.mission: Make Petra one of the new 7 wonders of the world!
cause.name: Vote for Petra
